Class VoyageState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.state.GameState
it.polimi.ingsw.model.state.VoyageState
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class VoyageState extends GameState
Space voyage phase of a match of Galaxy Trucker.

  • Constructor Details

    • VoyageState

      public VoyageState(ModelInstance model, GameModeType type, PlayerCount count, ArrayList<Player> players, iCards deck, iPlanche planche)
      Constructs a new VoyageState object.
      Parameters:
      model - ModelInstance ModelInstance that owns this {GameState.
      type - GameModeType Ruleset of the state.
      count - PlayerCount Size of the match.
      players - Array of all players in the match.
      deck - iCards Voyage deck containing the cards.
      planche - iPlanche Planche to use during the match.

    • findCriteria

      public Player findCriteria(CombatZoneCriteria criteria)
      Finds the farthest Player along the planche with the worst value specified by the CombatZoneCriteria.
      Parameters:
      criteria - CombatZoneCriteria Criteria according to which the Player is picked.
      Returns:
      Player Farthest player along the planche with the worst value specified by the CombatZoneCriteria.

    • getPlanche

      public iPlanche getPlanche()

    • setCardState

      public void setCardState(CardState next)
      Sets a new CardState, if null then picks a new iCard from the deck. Makes every player set to lose or give up retire.
      Parameters:
      next - CardState Next state to set.
